body: It seems a customized schedule produced by the **Honeybee_Create CSV Schedule** component is not acceptable by the **Honeybee_Add to EP library** component. May I ask how to add a customized schedule to the project library and call it for other use? Otherwise, we may need to manually connect the **csvSchedule** output node on the **Honeybee_Create CSV Schedule** component to other place requesting a schedule.  Thanks![](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-oaic7y9RVRar7dxRhKlvCgEuw7TyFuZUUYGvLnwwoflir1pbEXsFVWEYqBrGJOeZI8yZqjRz3HBIIntkyVLfSpGU0ENCiRA/09.JPG)
topic: how to save a customized schedule to the project library?
